title: Autopilot Failover Test
description: Comprehensive test to verify automatic failover to backup autopilot system
objective: Verify automatic failover to backup autopilot system
preconditions: Flight control surfaces in neutral position
All required test equipment calibrated and available
Safety protocols reviewed and in place
test_steps: 9. Power down and secure test setup
expected_results: System shall verify automatic failover to backup autopilot system
No error messages or warnings displayed
notes: Test execution ongoing. Preliminary results look promising.
